response.original_title: Animals in the Wild: Vol. 5: Animals Undercover
response.overview: Explore the world of animal camouflage with this fascinating program that explains and demonstrates how numerous species use various features to blend into their environment and protect themselves from predators. Closeup photography and computer imagery give viewers an amazing look at the magnificent and practical feathers, scales, fur, markings and other details these creatures use to hide themselves from view.
response.title: Animals in the Wild: Vol. 5: Animals Undercover
